extensionDescription.message: Clean your YouTube Watch Later playlist by removing seen videos based on progress bar detection

settingsEnableFeature.message: Activate Cleaner on Watch Later Page (Requires page reload)

settingsEnableFeatureDescription.message: Activates all video scanning, highlighting, and cleaning features on the YouTube Watch Later page.

confirmClean.message: Are you sure you want to remove {count} videos from Watch Later?

noVideosToClean.message: No seen videos found to clean.

videosSelectedForCleaning.message: {count} videos selected for cleaning. Click a video to exclude it.

noVideosSelectedForCleaning.message: No videos selected for cleaning. Click a highlighted video to include it.

confirmCleanSelected.message: Are you sure you want to remove {count} selected videos from Watch Later?

maxScrollAttemptsReachedLoading.message: Max scroll attempts reached while loading. Found {count} videos.

initialVideoLoadingComplete.message: Initial video loading complete. Found {count} videos. Preparing detailed scan...

preparingScrollScan.message: Preparing to scan all videos by scrolling...

noVideosForScrollScan.message: No videos found to scan by scrolling.

scrollScanProgress.message: Scanning playlist: Scrolling ({percent}% complete) to ensure video {current}/{total} renders.

scrollScanReachedBottom.message: Scanning playlist: Reached bottom. Scrolling back to top...

viewportScanComplete.message: Viewport scan complete. Analyzing videos for cleaning...

languageLabel.description: Label for the language selection dropdown in settings.

autoRescanAfterCleaningLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to enable/disable auto-rescanning after cleaning videos.

settingsSavedSuccess.description: Status message shown when settings are saved successfully from the popup.

settingsSavedError.message: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
settingsSavedError.description: Status message shown when settings fail to save from the popup.
